thread.title: Britney Spears Shows Off Toned Body in Skimpy New Outfit For Her Vegas Show
thread.title_full: Britney Spears Shows Off Toned Body in Skimpy New Outfit For Her Vegas Show

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Britney Spears Shows Off Toned Body in Skimpy New Outfit For Her Vegas Show
text: Britney Spears Shows Off Toned Body in Skimpy New Outfit For Her Vegas Show by Jennifer Drysdale 6:49   Getty Images Britney Spears is rocking her new costume! The 35-year-old singer took to Instagram on Friday to unveil a sexy new outfit from her show at the AXIS at Planet Hollywood in Las Vegas, showing off her killer bod. A video posted by Britney Spears (@britneyspears) on Jan 20, 2017 at 5:49pm PST WATCH: Britney Spears Says She's ‘Feeling Good About 2017,’ Shares Midnight Kiss With Rumored Boyfriend When Brit Brit's not slaying onstage, she's spending time with her rumored new boyfriend, Sam Asghari. The singer opened up about the fitness model for the first time during a radio interview on CBS Radio's Fast in the Morning With Nathan Fast on AMP 103.7 Dallas on Thursday. "It wasn't even a serious thing," Spears said of how she met Asghari while filming her music video for "Slumber Party." "It was one of those things that we were having a conversation to get through the experience, you know?" "I kept his number, and it was so weird -- it was like five months later, and I found his number in my bag. I was like, 'He is really cute. This guy is really cute.' So then I called him, and ever since then, he is just a really fun, funny person," she added.
